description:
A high-performance interface between the bike and your anatomy, these bib shorts set the standard for comfort and moisture transfer. The 8-panel cut is designed to fit closely and move as you move, without adding any resistance or pressure. The tailored chamois uses variable thickness padding and an ergonomic cut that relieves pressure points and allows air to circulate.

  • Select Transfer Dry fabric is made of nylon and spandex, with a sun-protective rating of UPF 50+
  • Flat-locked seams for comfort
  • Select Persuit chamois uses breathable 4-way stretch material and shaped, variable-density padding, up to 13mm
  • Silicone leg grippers keep the legs in place
  • Reflective elements for low-light visibility
name: Pearl Izumi Attack Bib Shorts - Men's
